title: Crumbs Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Take-out, British, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Another branch of Cardiff's Crumbs Kitchen. Casual cafe style restaurant but reported not vegetarian (Jun 2014) because they offer tuna, but keep it and prepare it entirely separate from everything else. The pita bread is vegan and comes with the curries.
